metrics_definitions.breakout_excess_atr_pct: ((close - level) / max(1e-9, ATR)) * 100  # sign depends on direction

evaluation.rule: count metrics at or above chosen T-level; triggers_level=Tn if >=3 metrics meet Tn; else fall back to T(n-1)
evaluation.fallback: Allow T1 + micro_exo (absorption/POC shift/stacked_imbalance>=3) to upgrade to effective T2
